name: MDC
title: MDC Nomenclature
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Health Care Devices Work Group)
description: ISO/IEEE 11073-10101 Nomenclature for point-of-care medical device communication.

property.description: Status of the term code in NIST RTMMS.
Indicates whether the term code has been agreed upon during the open consensus-based Rosetta harmonization process.
Partition is a group of semantics that are assigned to a contiguous term code range and have a categorical relationship.
